issues_reports.text: @ATT @att what didn’t feel good is being scammed, how did they get my att account number my phone number. You should warn clients about scams when you issue reward cards. #idontfeelsafewithyourcompany #scammers #attinternetservices

Hey @ATTHelp , my father-in-law has been trying to get internet service at his new house in Gainesville,FL for MONTHS. Runaround from local @ATTHelp store who said all was good then have ignored him. He’s been a customer for more than FORTY years. Please make this right.

@ATT it is truly disappointing that you don’t give your customer service team the tools they need to keep customers. After over 6-8 hours of my time being wasted I still now have to look into moving all@of my multiple phones and services to another carrier.
@SSOC_J @Xfinity @ATT **** is everyone's internet down, my **** just crashed mid smash lobby smh
@ATT I NEED HELP PAYING MY PHONE BILL ANS U GUYS DO NOT WORK WITH YOUR CUSTOMERS. THEY WILL CUT YOU OFF! SMFH!

The @ATT arrangement with unreliable @brinkshome to take over ATT Digital Life service is a pure waste of time and money. Repeated no-show and day-of install cancels, constant unmet promises to call or resolve. DON'T DO IT.
@ATT has got to be the absolute worst company for "customer service" over the past 2 days I have been put on hold going on 8 hours so far! Business account with lots of lines.
Since #5GRollout my poops have been more torpedo shaped. I've called @ATTHelp but received limited support.

@ATT I have tried to get tech support to assist with a two-factor verification issue for the last 24 hours. The phone number that the code is routing to is a non-working number. No one can or will assist. No supervisor call back. Your customer service is awful.
@ATTBusinessCare number was DM'd call if you want to help. but not much chance I will hear from anyone I am sure. 9 hours on hold yesterday and 2 today has proven how much @ATT cares about customers.
@ATT Yup. We all know big corporations would never lie to us. 🖕🏻

@ATT you keep holding my phone service hostage. Trying to cancel service. You wont let me speak to a person.  Computer only.  You want me to pay 400$ on a bill that has a zero balance.  I cannot get transferred to a live person.  Need help ASAP.

"It's survey time" 

Which company sucks the most?

1) The one who had a pattern drawn for them to not cut into internet lines but still did.
 
2) @ATT who is lazy and unprofessional as **** that claims they can't fix it for almost a week.

Just Switch from @ATT  to @Verizon  and This **** is worse than Att 🥺. Getting only 5 mbps. @VerizonSupport
Dear @ATT  your land line rates are thievery, your stock performance is dismal but if you ruin my vacation flight you’ll be the worst.

Reaching out to @ABCInvestigates to expose @ATT horrible business. Wrongfully charged, being disputed, service cut. Been dealing with @ATT for over 3 months to correct THEIR wrong, and supposedly no one can help. Reporting to BBB
@ATT has the worst internet & I'm mad I don't even have a choice b/c of my location. I need a more discounted rate b/c why am I paying what I'm paying for service that never works properly? 😠😐
@Uverse  When will you learn the customer is always right?
@krisvancleave @ATT Upload is garbage…

Hey @att do you know the number for me to switch to @CoxComm ? AT&T is doing work in our neighborhood and broke internet. They say it’s back up but me and a neighbor are still down, and support says we have to wait until tomorrow before they will work on it. It’s unacceptable.
@ATTHelp Hi guys, I waited to talk to a representative who didn't let me speak then he disconnected my call?? I was simply explaining my issue.
@OnlyTrueCoolest @Terrell352 @ATT just stay tuned but Im still trying to find all and help out bassicly :)
Not sure which cloud service @hbomax use but its really bad.. Slow is an understatement.. If the service didn’t come free with @ATT wireless plan, i’d never pay for such poor service…
